description: Information about the organism from which a specimen was collected.
title: donor_organism

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

human_specific.description: Fields specific to human (homo sapiens) organisms.

mouse_specific.description: Fields specific to mouse (mus musculus) organisms.

death.description: Information about conditions of death of an organism.

medical_history.description: Information about the medical history of an organism.

genus_species.description: The scientific binomial name for the species of the biomaterial.

organism_age.description: Age in age_units. Measured since birth.

organism_age_unit.description: The unit in which age is expressed. Must be one of hour, day, week, month, or year.

development_stage.description: A classification of the developmental stage of the organism.

disease.description: Short description of disease status of the organism.

familial_relationship.description: Information about other organisms related to this organism.

gestational_age.description: Gestational age in gestational_age_units. Measured since fertilization.

gestational_age_unit.description: The unit in which gestational age is expressed. Must be one of hour, day, week, month, or year.

height.description: Height of organism in height units.

height_unit.description: The unit in which height is expressed. Must be a child term of https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/uo/terms?iri=http%3A%2F%2Fpurl.obolibrary.org%2Fobo%2FUO_0000001.

is_living.description: Yes if organism is alive at time of biomaterial collection. No if dead. Unknown if not known.

biological_sex.description: The biological sex of the organism. Should be one of male, female, mixed, or unknown.

weight_unit.description: The unit in which weight is expressed. Must be a child term of https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/uo/terms?iri=http%3A%2F%2Fpurl.obolibrary.org%2Fobo%2FUO_0000002.
